Atrium LTS | Mid/Sr. Machine Learning or NLP Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Onsite | Full-Time The corporate legal industry has grown fat and comfortable on the back of poor incentives structured around billable hours. Justin Kan's Atrium ( https://abovethelaw.com/2017/10/justin-kan-answers-the-call-.... ) is reinventing the world of corporate legal work and growing incredibly quickly for a company founded just last year.

We are looking for experienced NLP (ideally) or ML generalist engineers to build our automation team. The team is an army of one at the moment and has headcount to rapidly grow throughout the year. We are looking for entrepreneurial, experienced NLP/ML engineers to join and build amazing products with us.

More details here https://jobs.lever.co/atrium/
